title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it doesn't take focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: Clicking on the first Combo should take focus, regardless of whether the combo list is dropped down or not.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Locate the first Combo.
3. Click on the Combo.
4. Verify that the Combo does not take focus on click.
